TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegionData extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装构成 对象的数据。

span.span: Encapsulates the data that makes up a object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`作为`Paint`事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形, 并将其绘制到屏幕黑色。Creates a rectangle and draw its to the screen in black. - 使用矩形创建区域。Creates a region using the rectangle. - 获取 RegionData。Gets the RegionData. - 使用 DisplayRegionData helper 函数将区域数据 (字节数组) 绘制到屏幕。Draws the region data (an array of bytes) to the screen, by using the DisplayRegionData helper function. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指定 对象的字节数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of bytes that specify the object.

value.span: 指定 对象的字节数组。

span.span: An array of bytes that specify the object.

remarks.format: ## Examples - 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`作为`Paint`事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 此代码示例演示如何使用从一个对象为另一个对象设置 。The code example demonstrates how to use the from one object to set the for another . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#13)]
